context: Are you interested in seeing a good movie

Whatever you know more i liked Get Out (2017) and i think it is a horror movie
i also liked Click (2010) which was made by Adan Sandlar Sandler, sorry. What is that movie about?
Yeah, i could enjoy that movie a lot!
Spaceballs (1987) is a spoof of star wars, with John Candy and Mel Brooks.
But i don't remember the name of the movie where he has to marry his bestfriend They are Fireman in the movie It sounds interesting!
I guess so, well thank you for your time I will try that movie, have a nice day Good bye
resp: You're welcome. So I would recommend Click (2010) I would also recommend Home Alone (1990) Good bye

You're welcome! Enjoy the movie! If you need more recommendations in the future, feel free to ask. Have a great day! Goodbye!

Thank you! I appreciate your help. By the way, I really enjoyed a movie where a man learns to appreciate life and family, and another one that features a young boy defending his home from intruders during the holidays. Both were really entertaining! Have a great day!
